heading: HB05053
0: AN ACT AMENDING SUBSECTION (C) OF SECTION 10 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9208, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ANTI-TRAFFICKING IN PERSONS ACT OF 2003"
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2017-02-22
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05053
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SUBSECTION (C) OF SECTION 10 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9208, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ANTI-TRAFFICKING IN PERSONS ACT OF 2003"
ABSTRACT : Restores the penalty of death for those convicted of qualified trafficking under Sec. 6 of Republic Act No.9208
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VIOLAGO, MICAELA S.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON REVISION OF LAWS ON 2017-02-22
